items.sentence: I haven\'t yet gotten used to how they do things here.
I heard that Tom doesn\'t sing as often as he used to.
I hope you\'re not planning on doing that by yourself.
I just came by to tell you that I\'m moving to Boston.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary had to quit her job.
Tom didn\'t need to take a taxi. He could have walked.
Tom didn\'t quite know how to respond to the question.
Tom didn\'t want to marry a woman who wanted children.
Tom didn\'t want to tell Mary about what had happened.
Every time I read this book, I discover something new.
